snippet: Russian authorities are examining clashes between protesters and riot police at a demonstration on May 6, the day before Vladimir V. Putin’s inauguration for a third term as president.
abstract: Russian authorities arrest five more people in continuing investigation of clashes between protesters and riot police officers at a demonstration in May, the day before Vladimir V Putin's inauguration for a third term as president; at least 20 police officers were injured, and more than 400 demonstrators were detained.
lead_paragraph: Russian authorities are examining clashes between protesters and riot police at a demonstration on May 6, the day before Vladimir V. Putin’s inauguration for a third term as president.

headline.seo: Russia Arrests 5 More People in Protest Investigation
headline.main: Russia Arrests 5 in Inquiry on Protest
headline.print_headline: Russia Arrests 5 in Inquiry On Protest
